profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-05-14 16:36:42 -0400.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials in this collection were compiled by the Tamiment Library staff. The accession number associated with this collection is 1984.004.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: SEE THE PUBLISHED GUIDE TO THE COLLECTION: Tamiment Library shelved at Tam Ref HN 90 .R3 T323 Collection of 8,672 pamphlets microfilmed on 89 reels shelved in the Tamiment Library at: R-1743 to R-1831.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Due to the fragile nature of the original materials, researchers must use the microfilmed version of the collection. The microfilm call number is Film R-1746 Non-circulating.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Materials in this collection, which were created in 1817-1970, are in the public domain. Permission to publish or reproduce is not required.
